body:
I think bumping zlib this breaks the build if EMBED_ZLIB is on. It works in our docker images (possibly they have the right zlib version?), but it's broken on my desktop. Needs further investigation.

```
jtattermusch@jtattermusch0:~/github/grpc$ make EMBED_ZLIB=true static_c
[MAKE]    Generating cache.mk
[C]       Compiling third_party/zlib/adler32.c
In file included from third_party/zlib/zutil.h:22:0,
                 from third_party/zlib/adler32.c:8:
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1420:1: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
 ZEXTERN z_size_t ZEXPORT gzfread OF((voidp buf, z_size_t size, z_size_t nitems,
 ^
In file included from third_party/zlib/zlib.h:34:0,
                 from third_party/zlib/zutil.h:22,
                 from third_party/zlib/adler32.c:8:
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1420:49: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
 ZEXTERN z_size_t ZEXPORT gzfread OF((voidp buf, z_size_t size, z_size_t nitems,
                                                 ^
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1420:64: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
 ZEXTERN z_size_t ZEXPORT gzfread OF((voidp buf, z_size_t size, z_size_t nitems,
                                                                ^
In file included from third_party/zlib/zutil.h:22:0,
                 from third_party/zlib/adler32.c:8:
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1454:1: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
 ZEXTERN z_size_t ZEXPORT gzfwrite OF((voidpc buf, z_size_t size,
 ^
In file included from third_party/zlib/zlib.h:34:0,
                 from third_party/zlib/zutil.h:22,
                 from third_party/zlib/adler32.c:8:
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1454:51: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
 ZEXTERN z_size_t ZEXPORT gzfwrite OF((voidpc buf, z_size_t size,
                                                   ^
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1455:39: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
                                       z_size_t nitems, gzFile file));
                                       ^
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1708:37: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
                                     z_size_t len));
                                     ^
third_party/zlib/zlib.h:1743:35: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
                                   z_size_t len));
                                   ^
third_party/zlib/adler32.c: In function ‘adler32_z’:
third_party/zlib/adler32.c:66:5: error: unknown type name ‘z_size_t’
     z_size_t len;
     ^
third_party/zlib/adler32.c: At top level:
cc1: error: unrecognized command line option "-Wno-shift-negative-value" [-Werror]
cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
```
